name: Hryvnia Stories
description:
We are used to seeing famous faces on our banknotes, but do we ever think of the stories these people have to tell? Let's take a look at Hryvnian ones from Ukraine!

In this game you get to explore some of those stories in a comical, Terry Gilliam'esque setting.

Most of the game's assets have been inspired by Ukrainian art and culture.

Playable in Polish, English and Ukrainian.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to play:

Use your mouse cursor to click on interactive elements. 

Press escape to skip intros and exit the game.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made by Zyrafa and Hotwen in about 42 hours for the UnitedWithUkraine GameJam.
